article_title: New Fireworks Business Open in Marion
article_text:
A new business has opened its doors in Marion this week.

The enclosed and air-conditioned building is brand new and features everything from professional display fireworks to sparklers. An assortment of roman candles, artillery shells and reloadable shells, and finale cakes are also among the impressive line-up inside of the building.

"For each individual, they're looking for their own particular type of bang or particular types of lights, so whatever anybody needs we have a very knowledgeable staff. We'll be able to direct them to whatever it is that they like the most,” owner Jeff Tate says.

As far as when to stock up on your supply of fireworks, Tate says many people wait until the day of to actually by their fireworks, but the sooner you come in, the better.

article_metadata.description: People will have a new place to shop for fireworks this fourth of July weekend.
article_metadata.author: Cash Matlock
